cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Rusty 2003 Acura RSX with only 249402 miles on it. Fabric seats, manual everything.
Leather seats.  Purrs like a kitty.  Shiny like a beautiful mug.  This is not your grandfather's automobile.
The 116 type chassis developed for racing since its first outing in the 1974 San Martino di Castrozza rallye.
Has a 4cyl engine with 8 spark plugs. Fires up nicely every time. Runs like it's fuel injected, but has a carburetor.
The Enzo can accelerate to 60 mph (97 km/h) in 3.14 seconds and can reach 100 mph (160 km/h) in 6.6 seconds.
